---
title: "Testresultater"
output: rmarkdown::html_document
---


```{r include=FALSE}
make_url <- function(base, ...) {
  parts <- unlist(list(...))
  
  # Remove leading/trailing slashes from the parts
  parts <- gsub("^/|/$", "", parts)
  
  # Combine the base and the parts, adding slashes between them
  url <- paste0(base, "/", paste(parts, collapse = "/"))
  
  # Correcting for cases where base URL already ends with a slash
  url <- gsub("([^:])/{2,}", "\\1/", url)
  
  return(url)
}
```

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
x <- pkgdown:::as_pkgdown(pkg = "..")
url <- make_url(x$meta$url,x$prefix,"testdown", "index.html")
```
